name: Spoty
description: Spoty is a microservice which provides REST API endpoints to query the current playing track on Spotify.

name: Timestream Travel
description: Timestream Travel is a CLI application to backup time-series data from Amazon Timestream to S3.

name: Mauritius Sea Cables
description: Speedtest CLI application for Mauritius Sea Cables.

name: Gocipe
description: Gocipe is a CLI application to generate full-blown headless Content Management Systems.
